definition: Yangguan or Southern Pass on the south Silk Road in Gansu, 70 km south of Dunhuang 敦煌
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
surname Guan
same as 陽關大道|阳关大道[Yang2 guan1 Da4 dao4]
(lit.) the road through Yangguan 陽關|阳关[Yang2 guan1]/(fig.) wide open road/bright future
lit. you hit the high road, I'll cross the log bridge (idiom)/fig. you go your way, I'll go mine/you do it your way, I'll do it mine
pinyin: ni3 zou3 ni3 de5 Yang2 guan1 Dao4 , wo3 guo4 wo3 de5 du2 mu4 qiao2
containing_words.word: 你走你的阳关道，我过我的独木桥

sentences.english: The sunshine greets me with a smile. The rain, his sad sister, talks my heart.
sentences.chinese: 阳关微笑着问候我，雨，他忧郁的妹妹向我吐露心声。

sentences.english: You go to your Yangguan Dao, I have had my Naihe Qiao.
sentences.chinese: 你走你的阳关道，我过我的奈何桥。

sentences.english: The wheat garrison forces is lately wild, the sword point keeps a Jing sun pass.
sentences.chinese: 阿麦驻军新野，剑尖直指靖阳关口。

sentences.english: The snow of Yangguan, was becoming more gloomy.
sentences.chinese: 阳关的风雪，竟愈见凄迷。

sentences.english: The Yangguan Pass is Just a beacon tower now.
sentences.chinese: 阳关现在只是一个烽火台。

sentences.english: We can walk through the shadows, or we can to smile and seek out the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在阴影中徘徊，也可以微笑着找寻阳关。

sentences.english: Jun persuade even a glass of wine to make the West a reason people Guan Yang.
sentences.chinese: 劝君更尽一杯酒，西出阳关无故人。

sentences.english: He’s really a trailblazer paving the way for the rest of us.
sentences.chinese: 他就是先驱，为我们其他人指了一条阳关大道。

definition: Yumen Pass, or Jade Gate, western frontier post on the Silk Road in the Han Dynasty, west of Dunhuang, in Gansu
Hexi Corridor (or Gansu Corridor), a string of oases running the length of Gansu, forming part of the Northern Silk Road
border fort, esp. defending narrow valley
mountain pass
old name for the Pamir high plateau 帕米爾高原|帕米尔高原[Pa4 mi3 er3 Gao1 yuan2] on the border between Xinjiang and Tajikistan
(literary) vaginal opening/vulva
Yumen county level city in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
desert
short name for Gansu province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
Bügür nahiyisi or Luntai county in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州[Ba1 yin1 guo1 leng2 Meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang
Yin mountains in Inner Mongolia
defensive fort over border post
Dunhuang county level city in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
Anxi county, former name of Guazhou county 瓜州縣|瓜州县[Gua1 zhou1 xian4] in Jiuquan 酒泉[Jiu3 quan2], Gansu
Ganzhou district of Zhangye city 張掖市|张掖市[Zhang1 ye4 shi4], Gansu
Suzhou district of Jiuquan City 酒泉市, Gansu
Guazhou county in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
